sentences.sContent: Jesus, the incarnate Son of God
The media cast him as the devil incarnate (= someone very evil ).
sentences.sCn: 媒体把他描述成魔鬼的化身。

sentences.sContent: The iniquities of the regime are incarnated in one man.
sentences.sCn: 该体制的种种劣迹集中体现于一人。

sentences.sContent: ...a writer who incarnates the changing consciousness of the Americas.
sentences.sCn: ...典型地体现出美洲观念变化的一位作家。

synos.tran: 化身的；人体化的；肉色的
体现；使…具体化；使实体化

trans.tranCn: 化身的；人体化的；肉色的
体现；使…具体化；使实体化
trans.tranOther: If you say that a quality is incarnated in a person, you mean that they represent that quality or are typical of it in an extreme form
